name: Acquia Cloud
short_description:
Global organizations turn to Acquia to provide technical expertise and strategic
insight to build, deliver, and optimize the Drupal WCMS
long_description:
Acquia is helping some of the
world's leading brands succeed, including Twitter, Mercedes Benz, Warner Music
Group, and Stanford University. Join the more than 4,000 organizations that are
moving at the speed of the web with Acquia's solutions for content, community
and commerce. Acquia offers developer tools, cloud solutions and global
expertise to drive success the open source way.
